DOC.detailed_description: Atopic dermatitis ( AD ) common cutaneous inflammatory disease . The pathogenesis atopic dermatitis involve complex interaction atopy environmental protein allergens produce Th2 immune response IgE formation , Th2 cell dominate lesion atopic dermatitis , whereas Th1 Th2 cell co-dominate late eczematus lesion . Nummular dermatitis ( ND ) another common cutaneous inflammatory disease . The nummular patch papule disseminate four extremity less trunk . The serum level Th2 chemokines ( CCL17 , CCL22 , CCL27 ) elevate AD patient . The expression level chemokines lesional epidermis also increase . CCL18 derive APC also increase serum well lesional skin AD patient . In contrast , report regard chemokine expression profile ND patient . Because erosis remarkable exacerbate factor ND . The investigator hypothesize ND specialize contact dermatitis induce environmental substance . It known , CCL17 CXCL10 highly express lesion allergic contant dermatitis , whereas almost expression chemokines could detect lesion irritant contact dermatitis . The aim study measure serum level CCL17 , CCL18 , CCL22 CXCL10 expression level epidermis AD ND patient . The investigator hope result study provide useful information clinical differential diagnosis AD ND well understand pathogenesis ND .
